article.content:
org $7c00 sti mov dword [4*0x09], inte ;push word [dword 0x100000] jmp $

inte: mov ax, $b800 mov ds, ax mov [ds:0], word $0723 jmp $ align 512 store word $aa55 at $-2 db 0x100000-512 dup 0

按按钮会提示#。

org $7c00 sti mov dword [4*0x0b], inte push word [dword 0x100000] jmp $

inte: mov ax, $b800 mov ds, ax mov [ds:0], word $0723 jmp $ align 512 store word $aa55 at $-2 db 0x100000-512 dup 0

不按按钮会提示#
article.title: irq冲突啦
